entry.title: Large Bundle
entry.summary:
Distributeur : Spirit Bear Coffee Company
Type :
Prix : 399.99

Stay well stocked with a variety of Spirit Bear Coffee pods to help fuel your day. 

The Large Bundle includes:

  • UniServe Coffee Brewer
  • Eagle Medium Roast Single Serving Pods X 200
  • Orca Dark Roast Single Serving Pods X 200

* Spirit Bear Coffee pods are Kuerig compatible and 100% compostable 

Uni-Serve Coffee Brewer 

Compatible with all K-Cups & features a 65oz water reservoir.

Eagle Medium Roast

Roasted just slightly past medium to bring out it’s full glory, this artisan blend is what some have referred to as “the best damn coffee they’ve ever had!” We agree.

Orca Dark Roast

Orca is the First Nations symbol of Good and goodness is what this bold, medium-dark coffee is all about. Rich and intense with notes of roasted nuts and a subtle finish.

 

 

 

PODS FOR USE BY OWNERS OF KEURIG® COFFEE MAKERS. READ OUR FAQs FOR COMPATIBILITY DETAILS.

SPIRIT BEAR COFFEE HAS NO AFFILIATION WITH KEURIG, OR K-CUP.

entry.title: Small Bundle
entry.summary:
Distributeur : Spirit Bear Coffee Company
Type :
Prix : 199.98

Keep your small office or home well stocked with a variety of Spirit Bear Coffee pods to help fuel your day.  The Small Office or Home Bundle includes:

  • Hamilton Beach Single Serve Coffee Brewer
  • Eagle Medium Roast Single Serving Pods X 100
  • Orca Dark Roast Single Serving Pods X 100

* Spirit Bear Coffee pods are Kuerig compatible and 100% compostable 

Hamilton Beach Single-Serve Coffee Maker

The Hamilton Beach Single-Serve Coffee Maker lets you easily make a cup of coffee using K-cups. This versatile coffee maker fits perfectly on any kitchen counter-top and fits travel mugs! Brew up to a 14oz cup.

Eagle Medium Roast

Roasted just slightly past medium to bring out it’s full glory, this artisan blend is what some have referred to as “the best damn coffee they’ve ever had!” We agree.

Orca Dark Roast

Orca is the First Nations symbol of Good and goodness is what this bold, medium-dark coffee is all about. Rich and intense with notes of roasted nuts and a subtle finish.

 

 

FOR USE BY OWNERS OF KEURIG® COFFEE MAKERS. READ OUR FAQs FOR COMPATIBILITY DETAILS.

SPIRIT BEAR COFFEE HAS NO AFFILIATION WITH KEURIG, OR K-CUP.
